page.title: 07VILLAGE LIFE IN BLYTH. (1)
page.content: {INTER-VILLAGE QUIZ.} Blyth has done well so far in the 1985 inter-village quiz. Among fifty nine Nottinghamshire villages Blyth won their round answering questions on sport,music,general knowledge,politics and television. {BEST KEPT VILLAGE.} The inhabitants of Blyth are working hard hoping for success in the best kept village competition,in section B, 700-2,000 population. {SCOUTS,CUBS,GUIDES,BROWNIES.} Blyth cubs came fourth out of fourteen teams in a recent general knowledge quiz. There is a cubs fun camp in July, at Walesby, with Gandey's Family Circus. All the cubs and scouts took part in their jobwork; 75 years of guiding was celebrated at'Guides Alive on 8th June, and some Guides have been on a day trip to York,recently.
